be.woutdev.economy.api.account

Interface Account


  • public interface Account
    Each player has one Account linked to their account using the players unique id You can fetch Account-objects for online and/or offline users in the EconomyAPI. Accounts will be automatically cached.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.math.BigDecimal getBalance()
      Get the balance of this Account
      java.util.UUID getOwner()
      Get the owner of the Account
      boolean isServer()
      Check if this account belongs to the server
